editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Pauline EpistlesPaul’s Epistles. Petrus Aethiops, editor, Testamentum Novum cum epistula Pauli ad Hebraeos (Rome, 1548), and Epistulae XIII divi Pauli (Rome, 1549). F–13r: Romans. Tedros Abraha, La Lettera ai Romani Testo e commentary della versione Etiopica, AF 57 (Wiesbaden: Harrassowitz, 2001). comments on strophes and chapters in Romans: ቃሉ ፺ወ፬ ወ ምዕራፉ ፲. F–26r: 1 Corinthians. F–34r: 2 Corinthians. F–37v: Galatians. F–41v: Ephesians. Siegbert Uhlig and Helge Maehlum, Novum Testamentum aethiopice: die Gefangenschaftsbriefe, AF 33 (Stuttgart: Franz Steiner Verlag, 1993). F–44v: Philippians. Siegbert Uhlig and Helge Maehlum, Novum Testamentum Aethiopice: die Gefangenschaftsbriefe, AF 33 (Stuttgart: Franz Steiner Verlag, 1993). comments on strophes and chapters in Philippians: ቃሉ ፪፻፲ወ፪ ወምዕራፉ ፯. F–47r: Colossians. Siegbert Uhlig and Helge Maehlum, Novum Testamentum Aethiopice: die Gefangenschaftsbriefe, AF 33 (Stuttgart: Franz Steiner Verlag, 1993). comments on strophes and chapters in Colossians: ቃሉ ፫፻፲ወ፬ ወምዕራፈ [፬]. F–50r: 1 Thessalonians. comments on strophes and chapters in 1 Thesselonians: ቃሉ ፪፻፲ወ፪ ወምዕራፉ ፯. . F–51v: 2 Thessalonians. comments on strophes and chapters in 2Thesselonians: ቃሉ ፹ ወምዕራፉ ፭. F–54v: 1 Timothy. comments on strophes and chapters in 1 Timothy: ቃሉ ፫፻ ወምዕራፉ ፳፯. F–57r: 2 Timothy. comments on strophes and chapters in 2 Timothy: ቃሉ ፻ወ፯: ወምእራፉ ፪. F–58r: Titus. comments on strophes and chapters in Titus: ቃሉ ፯ ወ ምዕራፉ ፭. -59r: Philemon. Siegbert Uhlig and Helge Maehlum, Novum Testamentum Aethiopice: die Gefangenschaftsbriefe, AF 33 (Stuttgart: Franz Steiner Verlag, 1993). comments on strophes and chapters in Philemon: ቃሉ ፯ ወ ምዕራፉ ፪. F–67v: Hebrews. comments on strophes and chapters in the Book of Hebrews: ቃሉ ፫፻፵ወ፯ ወ ምዕራፉ ፳ወ፫. F-98v: The Acts of the Apostles, ግብረ፡ ሐዋርያት። See, Curt Niccum for text. The Bible in Ethiopia: Book of Acts. : Note of ownership, Ato ዛንጅር WITH
